remarks: The support of a tensor product of ring element families is contained in the product of the supports.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 18-Jul-2019.)
statement:
evlslem4.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
evlslem4.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
evlslem4.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
evlslem4.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
evlslem4.x $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> X e. B ) $.
evlslem4.y $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. J ) -> Y e. B ) $.
evlslem4.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
evlslem4.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. W ) $.
evlslem4 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. I , y e. J |-> ( X .x. Y ) ) supp .0. ) C_ ( ( ( x e. I |-> X ) supp .0. ) X. ( ( y e. J |-> Y ) supp .0. ) ) ) $.
$d .x. x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d I x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d X y $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x y $.
